description:
Kaspersky Security Scan is a handy and reliable antivirus solution designed to scan your PC for malware threats.
Kaspersky Security Scan performs in-depth scans of you computer and detects viruses that are residing on your system via the cloud-based database.
Kaspersky Security Scan also checks for security issues, such as the presence of an antivirus system or firewall.
summary:
A ‘second opinion’ of the security on your PC.
Kaspersky Security Scan won't fix, modify or delete any threats or security problems. However, it will provide you with a detailed report on the threats and where they were found.
author: Kaspersky Lab
